description:
Shipping and Receiving Clerk Position at a Logistics Company

Core Responsibilities

  • Receiving and recording incoming shipments, ensuring accuracy and completeness
  • Packaging items according to customer requirements
  • Entering shipment data into computer systems
  • Verifying order details and quantities, using weight scales
  • Moving parts to designated storage areas
  • Delivering non-inventory items to end users
  • Adhering to safety policies and procedures
  • Other duties as assigned

Requirements

Education: Secondary Certificate/High School Diploma or equivalent

Experience: 0 - 2 years in relevant field

Skills

  • Strong communication skills
  • Forklift operation abilities
  • Basic computer proficiency
  • Excellent multitasking skills

Please note: Regular attendance is mandatory, and flexibility in working hours may be required, including nights and weekends.

Employment Type: Temporary
